title: Enacts the "Rockland Bergen Bi-state watershed flood prevention and protection act"
summary: Enacts the "Rockland Bergen Bi-State Watershed Flood Prevention and Protection Act"; creates the twelve member Rockland Bergen Bi-State River Commission to identify and remediate the potential flood protection hazards along the tributaries and watersheds of the Hackensack River, Mahwah River, Ramapo River, Saddle River and Sparkill Brook/Creek that cross the interstate border region.
actClause: AN ACT enacting the "Rockland Bergen Bi-state watershed flood prevention and protection act" and creating the Rockland Bergen Bi-state River Commission
